attributes.action: To start teaching consent to primary aged children
attributes.additional_details: all kids need to be taught from a young age what boundaries are. I hope that in the coming year this will reduce the number of sexual assaults. Rape culture begins young and it must be prevented
attributes.background: I want it to be mandatory for all primary schools to teach kids of all ages about consent. When i was 10 years old there was an incident with a student in the year above, he probably doesn’t even remember the it but i will never forget it. Behaviour like this needs to be nipped in the bud
